      • registerCapabilities

        public static void registerCapabilities(@NotNull
                                        @NotNull org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                                        @NotNull
                                        Capability... capabilities)
        Registers Alpine Client capabilities for a given plugin.

        Should be called once for all your desired capabilities on plugin enable.

        Parameters:
        plugin - the responsible Plugin
        capabilities - a varargs array containing Capability
        Since:
        1.3.0
        See Also:
        Plugin.onEnable()

      • unregisterCapabilities

        public static void unregisterCapabilities(@NotNull
                                          @NotNull org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Unregister all Alpine Client capabilities for a given plugin.

        Should be called once on plugin disable.

        Parameters:
        plugin - the responsible Plugin
        Since:
        1.3.0
        See Also:
        Plugin.onDisable()
